description: Transfer modes used for MaaS internal services

anyOf.description: A mode that only involves waiting in the current location
A mode that involves changing transports
A mode that involves using your personal vehicle or legs
A mode that involves transit with fixed schedules
A mode that is available on-demand for your personal use

waitingMode.description: A mode that only involves waiting in the current location

transferMode.description: A mode that involves changing transports

personalMode.description: A mode that involves using your personal vehicle or legs

publicTransitMode.description: A mode that involves transit with fixed schedules

privateTransitMode.description: A mode that is available on-demand for your personal use
